documents.document: @ElizabethShopl2 I know!! Local garage coming round in the morning 😱⚙️🔧💰💰💰
@MissyHedgehog You can delete any pics you don't want on Whatsapp. This clears lots of space.
@MissyHedgehog My IPhone 5 has very limited storage so I'm constantly looking for ways to free space. Whatsapp needs monitoring too!
Did you know that your twitter app gets bigger the more you use it? 😳 I just deleted then reinstalled to free storage on iPhone.
@hants__girl Maybe...I'll plate up for you 👍
@hants__girl Chicken risotto. Have you decided what you're having yet? 😀
@colinwright1959 Hope it won't cost too much! 😫
@colinwright1959 Thanks Colin will ring my local garage. Hopefully they won't might coming round to have a look at it. X
@colinwright1959 I don't know Colin! I'm afraid to get in! Do you think my suspension has gone?
Something terrible has happened to my car! I heard a bang & now one side is lower than the other 😱Thankfully it's parked on drive 🚘
@clairepilkingt2 Go for it! It's so much easier than the gym. 10 kms in 20 mins- no probs. Increase the intensity as you get fitter xx
@clairepilkingt2 I love mine. Go on every day for about 20 mins 👍🚴‍♀️ xx
What a brilliant start to the #sixnations #Wales
@j7bmd Brilliant! I'm in good company 👍 #GoWales
Am I the only one who wears a rugby shirt on match day even if you're watching the match at home? 😂 #WALvITA… https://t.co/jE9deTFEck
@ReviesLegends That's the plan 😀 #WALvITA
@ReviesLegends It's all about #Wales today 👍
@BazTheBarbarian Aww that's so lovely Baz xx
@dessertscardiff Cheers 👍All the best with the new business venture 🍰🍰🍰🍰🍰🍰
@BazTheBarbarian @dessertscardiff They haven't followed me lol! I hope you'll be putting in a big order to make their journey worthwhile 👍😜
I think @dessertscardiff think I have a bit of a sweet tooth just because I'm tweeting about Toblerone 😜
@Floppet1 Haha! Obviously lol! I'm only 2 triangles in so far...pacing myself 😜xx
The joy you feel, when you find the large Toblerone left over from Christmas, on a Saturday night in February! 😀🎉
They all have such furrowed brows on #Corrie tonight! 😱
Friday night is #cocktail night #Sidecar https://t.co/oM03hTNSNR
That was some delicious Cajun chicken @DiabloCardiff https://t.co/N3NRf823Jp
Getting the weekend started with lunch @DiabloCardiff 🍻🍴 https://t.co/yqggRVcWvP
This wonderful lady delivered me into the world #RIP Nurse Phillips https://t.co/0GnMjrF8Yd
Time for a #Lidl bit of shopping 👍🏻
#BlackEyedPeas you've killed me again this morning in the #exercisebike 😅🚴🏻‍♀️🎤
@EdisonJunction Have a great night guys! 🎤 Looking forward to album launch event soon 🎤👍😀 @ElizabethShopl2 https://t.co/oyKF11OEIa
@purpilpal Hi Pauline I used a YouTube tutorial and it was great fun! You're right...acrylics are easier to work with than watercolours 👍
Dabbled with acrylics this morning! 👩‍🎨🎨 #painting #newhobby
Today's fave cycling track has to be #DirtyBit #BlackEyedPeas @iamwill Gets those pedals turning! 🚴😅
@starshiphonda Yes I thought it probably was a rabbit🐰 x
@AnnaCrowhurst 😂 Maybe...this is Wales! 🐉
@Libbyextra I bet you have some bracing coastal walks in Scotland 😀
@lynnellenbooth Lots of burrows and plenty of 'evidence' that the wildlife comes out at night 😜
@deniseabbott48 Totally different to the muddy woods we usually walk in xx
@lynnellenbooth Lots of birds but not close enough to identify. There was a warning about adders but thankfully didn't see any! 🐍😱
@Libbyextra It did feel a bit like a wilderness at times! But very exhilarating
@lynnellenbooth It was a nice change not to be walking through mud but the sand was heavy going on the legs! Great workout 😅
What lives in a hole like this? #dunes #MerthyrMawr https://t.co/qJ4ki9hAdm
A very different walk today exploring the sand dunes at #MerthyrMawr #Bridgend #dunes #sea #river #nature https://t.co/JuqtrkU0Xd
@BridgendCBC Serious water leak, Ladies toilet Candleston car park Merthyr Mawr. Water running across car park
It's #WednesdayWalk day. Let's hope the rain stays away! Walking boots at the ready 👍
What a lot of browsing in one afternoon! Of course it resulted in buying loads of stuff I didn't know I needed 😂 #hobbycraft #costco
Off to town. Still haven't spent my Xmas vouchers.
@hants__girl Get well wishes for your daughter Thinking of you xxx
@LouSmorals @KatieMagnet Haha I love a red Tepe😁
Ooh my search has moved! 👀😂
@GylesB1 Great answer on #Pointless tonight 👍🏻
It appears that #BigGardenBirdWatch website has crashed! Just input details and would not let me submit #tryagainlater 😐
Time to count the birds visiting the garden #RSPB #Birdwatch 🐦🍂🐦🍂🐦
@Maureen45568301 It's 10 yrs since I touched his arm 😂
@Maureen45568301 Hi Mo he was fantastic as usual! Great night 💕 xx
@susan_thornley He's about to shake another. Will pass you one 🍸😀
@susan_thornley Donny was fantastic Susan! We had a fab time xx
#Cosmopolitan Shaken not stirred! 🍸🍸 https://t.co/765WCTP0bJ
OH is channelling his inner Tom Cruise! The cocktail shaker is out 😀🍸🍸
I'll have sweet dreams tonight 💕💕 #Donny https://t.co/1jKTiK8DnA
@suepembs You know @ElizabethShopl2 She's a Pembs girl too xx

@dustbustin Fingers crossed for you xx
@juliemac1000 @Helgabips I have a table booked in Prezzo for this evening before going to Donny concert xxx
@donnyosmond Sending you a great big Welsh cwtch (hug) from Cardiff 😘💕 Can't wait for the show tonight 🎉💕
@Maureen45568301 Aww thanks Mo! Should be a good night xxx
@CazzaWhitlock Yes of course! Can't wait for a catch up. You'll have to remind me when half term is 😂😂👍 xxx
@CazzaWhitlock Hiya👋😀How are you? Loving your class tweets xx
Can't wait for tomorrow night @ElizabethShopl2 🎤💕 https://t.co/IY8svD1Oab
Today's walk #DareValleyCountryPark https://t.co/t0iynPq3Ff
@AnouskaBell I've not heard of that one 😂 I think my hot pants days are long over 👍🏻😜 xx
Exercise bike ✔️ Now shower Then walking boots on and off we go #WednesdayWalkDay #retirement 😀😀
@cuff52 Thanks Jane. We can't wait 🎉👰
@mini_lebowski I know! Exciting times ahead. Son getting married in June hot on the heels of my daughter last September!!
@cymruwales @RachelELCarey Shame he couldn't make the wedding 😂👍
@cymruwales @RachelELCarey So is he a relative? 😂😂 👍 #ChaseCarey #F1 Here's hoping 😂🍾
Mother of the groom outfit will be happening soon!! 👰🏼💑👗👠👒🎉🍾💕💐😀😀😀💕 https://t.co/6JiFJupOaw
@St85590874Julie They do seem to come in waves. Are they just bots not real?
@St85590874Julie I get them too. I ignore them and after a few days they unfollow 👍🏻
Let's just say those running tracks I mentioned yesterday got the pedals turning 😅😅 All I can say is #pumpupthejam 😂😂 Sprinting tracks next!
@bluemozza That's brilliant 👍🏻 I'm loving #AppletreeYard
Bluetooth paired Tunes ready Let the cycling begin 🚴🏻‍♀️🚴🏻‍♀️ #exercisebike
@bluemozza I missed that today. So what is your link? 😂👍🏻
@dustbustin @izbinnington Is this your lovely daughter? Happy birthday Isobel 🎉🍾🎂🎉🍾🎂
@lynnellenbooth We're making bird cake tomorrow 😂👍🐦 xx
@lynnellenbooth That's exactly how we're starting. Also encouraging them into the garden 🐦🐦🐦
@BazTheBarbarian Sounds like a big night! I applaud your will power until now 👏👏👏Have a great night 🎉🍷🍾🍻🍻🍻🍻🍻
@lizcrippinmusic Ooh I feel for you!! Really hate spending money on garage bills. Feels like you've got nothing to show for your money 😕
@lynnellenbooth We're new to bird watching , since I retired last July but are getting more into it all the time
@lynnellenbooth Lovely pics Lynne. Are you doing the #RSPB birdwatch at the weekend? Our pack came this week xx
@lauramullins1 Definitely 👍😀 xx
@joanneweir38 Well thank goodness for that but isn't it typical they give attitude when there's no payment involved 👊
@joanneweir38 Ooh hope it won't cost much. I hate paying garage bills!!!
@moonvic76 You poor thing! You've been poorly for ages. Sending get well wishes 💐😘💐😘💐
@Roselady64 Aww thanks Rosie. I feel encouraged for tomorrow's running tracks 😂👍🏻
Just cycled to a Running Trax compilation! Please excuse me But I can't speak And it was only jogging tracks!! Running tracks tomorrow..,
@lauramullins1 Hi Lau! How's things? Don't see you on Twitter much these days. Xxx
@Maureen45568301 Oh wow! Happy 30th to Claire on Thursday xx
